title: Drawing, "Design for a Sugar Bowl", ca. 1920–40
inscribed: Inscribe in graphite at lower center: 138
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description: Cylindrical sugar bowl drawn in plan and elevation decorated with thick vertical bands cinched at the middle around the base of the body, the rounded lid surmounted by a circularsimilarly decorated finial with alternative drawing of a taller arched finial. Elongated scroll handle connecting to the short cylindrical base.
